channel.title: 508 giveadmin command

item.title: 508 giveadmin command
item.dc:creator: @cloudscape cloudscape
item.description:
@cloudscape wrote:

That I am mate, that I am… But nevertheless, i made it correct? And it don’t wanna work D:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2008, 09:03:15 pm[/size][hr][quote=“tonypker13, post:8, topic:249626”]Place it under the P rights 2 command lines.

if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin")) {
String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.rights = 2;
p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator by " + p.username);
p2.updateReq = true;
p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
}
}

Lol, well, seeing as i coded this command myself, why would i mess the username up lol

And no you didn’t… This is Pixels release. Stop lieing.[/quote]

Erm, yes i did, i just sat here for 10-15 mins making a few commands…

Read full topic

String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.rights = 2;
p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator by " + p.username);
p2.updateReq = true;
p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
}
}

And no you didn’t… This is Pixels release. Stop lieing.

item.title: 508 giveadmin command
item.dc:creator: @cloudscape cloudscape
item.description:
@cloudscape wrote:

Hi guys,

I recently made a give admin command for my 508 and I can’t see what is wrong with it… But when I try to use it nothing happens

} } if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("Decimation")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

Thanks for your time.

Read full topic
